alert.note: Alert for Kent; Queen Anne's; Talbot (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 30 at 5:31PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of north central Talbot, central Queen Anne`s and Kent Counties through 615 PM EDT... At 530 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Betterton to near Rock Hall to Kent Point. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Centerville, Chestertown, Centreville, Rock Hall, Betterton, Old Town, Grasonville, Stevensville, Langford, Chester, Newtown, Overton, Morgnec, Kennedyville, Starkey Corner, Queenstown, Stevensville South and Kingstown. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
